General Feats: 5 selections
Half-Orc: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Instinct: 1 selection
Natural Ambition: +1 Class Feat
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Acute Vision: Has the Darkvision feature during rage
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Reckless Abandon: When reduced to 164 or fewer Hit Points during rage, may suffer -2 AC and -1 saves to gain +2 attacks
Perception: +30 (wisdom; master)

Acute Scent: R30' imprecise scent
Assurance (Athletics): May forgo rolling a Athletics check for an automatic 38
Assurance (Farming Lore): May forgo rolling a Farming Lore check for an automatic 32
Assurance (Nature): May forgo rolling a Nature check for an automatic 34
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Expeditious Search: May Search at 2x normal Speed
Incredible Initiative: +2 on initiative rolls
Intimidating Glare: May use glare to Demoralize
Quick Jump: May use High Jump and Long Jump as 1 action without an initial Stride
Raging Athlete: Gains 25' climb and swim Speed, -10 jump DC, and 5'/15' vertical/horizontal Leap during rage
Raging Intimidation: May use Demoralize during rage
Student Of The Canon: All critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Cannot fail to Recall Knowledge about own faith
Combat
Hit Points: 328 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (4 max); master) Class DC: Barbarian: 41 (strength; master)
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Light Hammer (+31 1d6+5 B R20'; strength; master); Longsword (+31 1d8+5 S/P; strength; master); Sap (+31 1d6+5 B; strength; master)
Combat Notes:
Animal Skin: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Armor Of Fury: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Heavy Armor)
Brutality: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Devastator: Class Master (Barbarian)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Greater Weapon Specialization: Increased Weapon Specialization effects
Medium Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +5
Unconventional Weaponry: Attack Trained (Choose 1 from any)/Treats chosen weapon as one category simpler
Weapon Fury: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Animal Skin: +3 AC during rage
Attack Of Opportunity: May use a Reaction to make a melee Strike on foe that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Awesome Blow: A successful Athletics vs. Fortitude with Knockback Shoves and Trips foe
Bestial Rage: Fangs inflict 1d12B HP and tongue 1d6B HP during rage
Brutal Bully: Successful Disarm, Grapple, Shove, or Trip inflicts 5B HP damage during rage
Brutal Critical: Critical melee hits inflict +1 damage die and 2 damage dice bleed damage
Brutality: May use melee and unarmed weapon critical specialization effects while raging
Cleave: May use a Reaction after killing or knocking unconscious a foe to Strike an adjacent foe
Collateral Thrash: May affect another adjacent foe (DC 41 Ref neg) with a successful Thrash
Come And Get Me: May suffer flat-footed and +2 HP foe damage to gain +4 temporary Hit Points from a successful Strike (critical success +8) on a successful attacker until rage ends
Contagious Rage: May use Share Rage unlimited times, also sharing instinct and specialization abilities
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed to foes of equal or lower level
Devastator: Successful melee Strikes ignore 10 points of physical damage resistance
Draconic Rage: May inflict +4 HP fire damage instead of +2 HP weapon damage during rage
Dragon's Rage Breath: May use breath to inflict 20d6 damage in a 30' cone or 60' line 1/rage (Ref neg; half distance and damage for a 2nd breath use within 1 hour)
Dragon's Rage Wings: May fly 25'/rd during rage
Fast Movement: +10 Speed during rage
Furious Bully: +2 Athletics for attacks during rage
Furious Finish: May gain additional damage on a Strike during rage; suffers end of rage and fatigue until 10 min rest
Furious Grab: May automatically grab foe after a successful Strike
Furious Sprint: May use 2 actions to Stride 125' in a straight line, or 3 actions to Stride 200'
Giant's Lunge: May extend reach of melee weapons and unarmed attacks to 10' until rage ends
Giant's Stature: May grow to Large size, gaining +5' reach and suffering clumsy 1, until rage ends
Great Cleave: May continue to Cleave adjacent foes as long as Strikes incapacitate
Knockback: May shove foe 5' after a successful Strike
Mighty Rage: May use a rage action as a free action when entering rage
Moment Of Clarity: During rage, may use 1 action to allow use of concentration actions for the remainder of the turn
No Escape: May use a Reaction to Stride along with retreating foe
Perfect Clarity: May use a Reaction to end rage for a +2 reroll on a failed attack or Will save
Predator's Pounce: May Strike after moving 25' in light or no armor
Quick Rage: May re-enter rage after 1 turn
Rage: May gain 24 temporary Hit Points and +12 HP melee damage (agile weapon +1 HP), and suffer -1 AC and no concentration actions, for 1 min; requires 1 min between rages
Raging Thrower: +12 HP thrown weapon damage during rage/Brutal Critical and Devastator effects apply to thrown weapons
Renewed Vigor: May gain 14 temporary Hit Points
Second Wind: May immediately re-enter rage; suffers fatigue afterwards until 10 min rest
Shake It Off: May reduce a frightened condition by 1 and reduce a sickened condition by 1/2/3 with a fail/success/critical success on a Fortitude save during rage
Share Rage: R30' May give an ally the effects of Rage 1/rage
Specialization Ability: Rage damage bonus with Spirit Rage increases to +13
Spirit Rage: May inflict +3 HP positive or negative damage, along with ghost touch, instead of +2 HP weapon damage during rage
Spirit's Wrath: May make a R120' +33 spirit Strike that inflicts 4d8+4 HP negative or positive damage; a critical hit also inflicts frightened 1
Spirits'Interference: Foe ranged Strikes require a DC 5 flat check until rage ends
Sudden Charge: May use 2 actions to make a melee Strike after a double Stride
Sudden Leap: May use 2 actions to make a Strike during a Leap, High Jump, or Long Jump
Swipe: May use 2 actions to attack 2 adjacent foes with a single Strike
Terrifying Howl: R30' Successful Intimidate Demoralizes multiple foes
Thrash: May inflict 17B HP + specialization damage to grabbed foe (Fort neg)
Titan Mauler: May use weapons made for a larger creature, gaining +6 HP damage and suffering clumsy 1
Titan's Stature: May grow to Huge size, gaining +10' reach and suffering clumsy 1, until rage ends
Vengeful Strike: May use a Reaction while using Come And Get Me to make a Strike when hit by a Strike
Vicious Evisceration: May use 2 actions for a Strike that inflicts drained 1 (critical success drained 2)
Weapon Specialization: +4/+6/+8 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Whirlwind Strike: May use 3 actions to Strike each foe within reach
Wounded Rage: May use a Reaction after taking damage to enter rage
Save: Fortitude: +32 (constitution; legendary); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Greater Juggernaut: Save Legendary (Fortitude)
Indomitable Will: Save Master (Will)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Breath Control: +1 vs. inhaled threats/Success vs. inhaled threat is always a critical success
Greater Juggernaut: Critical failures on Fortitude saves are normal failures/Suffers half damage on failed Fortitude save
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental control are critical successes/Foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Indomitable Will: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Raging Resistance: Resistance 7 to negative damage and damage from undead while raging
Magic
Spells:
Animal Form
Dragon Form
Earthquake
Magic Notes:
Animal Rage: May use Animal Form effects to transform into spirit animal at will
Dragon Transformation: May use Dragon Form effects, with +20 fly Speed, +12 dragon Strikes, and +14 HP breath weapon damage, during rage
Quaking Stomp: May use Earthquake effects 1/10 min
Notes
Validation Errors:
